trans-unit.source: Add one or more solution items to a solution file.
trans-unit.target: Add one or more solution items to a solution file.

trans-unit.source: Place file in root of the solution, rather than creating a solution folder.
trans-unit.target: Place file in root of the solution, rather than creating a solution folder.

trans-unit.source: The paths to the solution items to add to the solution.
trans-unit.target: The paths to the solution items to add to the solution.

trans-unit.source: FILE_PATH
trans-unit.target: FILE_PATH

trans-unit.source: The destination solution folder path to add the files to.
trans-unit.target: The destination solution folder path to add the files to.

trans-unit.source: Add one or more solution folders to a solution file.
trans-unit.target: Add one or more solution folders to a solution file.

trans-unit.source: Place folder in root of the solution, rather than creating a solution folder.
trans-unit.target: Place folder in root of the solution, rather than creating a solution folder.

trans-unit.source: The paths to the solution folders to add to the solution.
trans-unit.target: The paths to the solution folders to add to the solution.

trans-unit.source: FOLDER_PATH
trans-unit.target: FOLDER_PATH

trans-unit.source: The destination solution folder path to add the folders to.
trans-unit.target: The destination solution folder path to add the folders to.

trans-unit.source: Place project in root of the solution, rather than creating a solution folder.
trans-unit.target: Place project in root of the solution, rather than creating a solution folder.

trans-unit.source: The destination solution folder path to add the projects to.
trans-unit.target: Путь к папке назначения решения, в которую будут добавлены проекты.

trans-unit.source: .NET modify solution file command
trans-unit.target: Команда .NET "Изменить файл решения"

trans-unit.source: Command to add, remove, and list projects from the solution (SLN) file.
trans-unit.target: Эта команда может добавить, перечислить проекты в файле решения (SLN) и удалить их.

trans-unit.source: Projects to add or to remove from the solution.
trans-unit.target: Проекты, которые будут добавлены в решение или удалены из него.

trans-unit.source: Add one or more projects to a solution file.
trans-unit.target: Добавление проектов в файл решения.

trans-unit.source: Only .sln files can be migrated to .slnx format.
trans-unit.target: Only .sln files can be migrated to .slnx format.

trans-unit.source: An existing project cannot be added as a solution item.
trans-unit.target: An existing project cannot be added as a solution item.

trans-unit.source: Cannot add the same solution to itself.
trans-unit.target: Cannot add the same solution to itself.

trans-unit.source: Could not find file `{0}`.
trans-unit.target: Could not find file `{0}`.

trans-unit.source: Display solution folder paths.
trans-unit.target: Отображение путей к папке решения.

trans-unit.source: Generate a .slnx file from a .sln file.
trans-unit.target: Generate a .slnx file from a .sln file.

trans-unit.source: PROJECT_PATH should not be provided for `dotnet sln add file`
trans-unit.target: PROJECT_PATH should not be provided for `dotnet sln add file`

trans-unit.source: PROJECT_PATH should not be provided for `dotnet sln add folder`
trans-unit.target: PROJECT_PATH should not be provided for `dotnet sln add folder`

trans-unit.source: Remove one or more projects from a solution file.
trans-unit.target: Удаление проектов из файла решения.

trans-unit.source: Remove the specified project(s) from the solution. The project is not impacted.
trans-unit.target: Удаляет указанные проекты из решения. Сами проекты не затрагиваются.

trans-unit.source: List all projects in a solution file.
trans-unit.target: Вывод списка всех проектов в файле решения.

trans-unit.source: List all projects in the solution.
trans-unit.target: Перечисляет все проекты в решении.

trans-unit.source: Could not read solution file {0}. Supported files are .sln and .slnx valid solutions.
trans-unit.target: Could not read solution file {0}. Supported files are .sln and .slnx valid solutions.

trans-unit.source: .slnx file {0} generated.
trans-unit.target: .slnx file {0} generated.

trans-unit.source: The solution {0} already contains the solution item `{1}`
trans-unit.target: The solution {0} already contains the solution item `{1}`

trans-unit.source: The solution {0} already contains the solution folder `{1}`
trans-unit.target: The solution {0} already contains the solution folder `{1}`

trans-unit.source: SLN_FILE
trans-unit.target: SLN_FILE

trans-unit.source: The solution file to operate on. If not specified, the command will search the current directory for one.
trans-unit.target: Обрабатываемый файл решения. Если не указать его, команда будет искать его в текущем каталоге.

trans-unit.source: PROJECT_PATH
trans-unit.target: PROJECT_PATH

trans-unit.source: The paths to the projects to add to the solution.
trans-unit.target: Пути к проектам, которые необходимо добавить в решение.

trans-unit.source: PROJECT_PATH
trans-unit.target: PROJECT_PATH

trans-unit.source: The paths to the projects to remove from the solution.
trans-unit.target: Пути к проектам, которые необходимо удалить из решения.

trans-unit.source: Project(s)
trans-unit.target: Проекты

trans-unit.source: The type of the solution element to add or remove. Allowed values are project, item, and folder.
trans-unit.target: The type of the solution element to add or remove. Allowed values are project, item, and folder.

trans-unit.source: The solution folder `{0}` was added to the solution
trans-unit.target: The solution folder `{0}` was added to the solution

trans-unit.source: The --solution-folder and --in-root options cannot be used together; use only one of the options.
trans-unit.target: Параметры --solution-folder и --in-root options не могут быть использованы одновременно; оставьте только один из параметров.

trans-unit.source: Solution Folder(s)
trans-unit.target: Папки решения

trans-unit.source: Solution Folder names cannot: - contain any of the following characters: / : ? \ * " < > | - contain Unicode control characters - contain surrogate characters - be system reserved names, including CON, AUX, PRN, COM1 or LPT2 - be . or ..
trans-unit.target: Solution Folder names cannot: - contain any of the following characters: / : ? \ * " < > | - contain Unicode control characters - contain surrogate characters - be system reserved names, including CON, AUX, PRN, COM1 or LPT2 - be . or ..

trans-unit.source: The solution item `{0}` was added to the solution folder `{1}`
trans-unit.target: The solution item `{0}` was added to the solution folder `{1}`

trans-unit.source: There is already an existing solution item '{0}' with the same name in the solution folder '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: There is already an existing solution item '{0}' with the same name in the solution folder '{1}'.

trans-unit.source: You must specify at least one file to add.
trans-unit.target: You must specify at least one file to add.

trans-unit.source: You must specify at least one folder to add.
trans-unit.target: You must specify at least one folder to add.
